name: The Last Sword
description:
A man who comes from another world falls from the sky, he knows nothing about his past, but his future will be very interesting, in the world called Lunaria you will find all kinds of magical creatures, you will make many friends, but what you don't know... is that you are the one chosen to save Lunaria, you will have to find the sword with which the last hero defeated the demons.

Características Principales


A fantasy world full of magical places and different enemies, warriors, archers, wizards, etc.


Along your way you will find many magic trainers who can teach you the different spells of fire, ice, lightning, healing, poison, etc.

FIREEEEEEEEEEEEE!


A wide range of weapons to choose how to fight, two-handed sword or shield and sword, that's up to you!
You choose your path, you can start doing all the missions or go ahead and choose the ones you think are best for you.
